description_text: This the pic you need or the freejoy software interface

conversations.body_text:
Hi buddy I have a huge problem well I call it huge u may call it a rookie
mistake I have my pedals working and mate what a big step up for me only
issue is I mistakenly also wrote the pedals config to my shifter didn't
realise till it was too late it's the 7+r cylindrical shifter I can't get
it back to default it doesn't work in games any more ?

My shifter is now only registering three gears and I can't get it back to
default it's being detected as a freejoy controller where it should display
as Simsonn-h shifter any suggestions on getting it back to default I tried
disconnecting there shifter and wiping out the driver but it still gets
picked up as a freejoy
Hi gavin rhodes,  Could you please send me a screenshot of the FreeJoy device connection interface? I need to check your device version so I can provide the appropriate recovery configuration file.

I can send it a bit later I've shut the pc down so i can get some sleep bud
it doesn't display a version but I'll send pics for sure tomorrow

On Mon, 7 Jul 2025, 4:25 am service@simsonn.com,

That's my shifter but it's acting like a set of pedals when I change gear
I'm only getting 1 2 4
3567and r no longer work

And also what do you mean by interface do you need the pic of the software
I'm using or the shifter itself
Hi gavin rhodes,  Please take a photo of the FreeJoy interface and send it to me.
On Mon, 7 Jul 2025, 8:47 am service@simsonn.com,

I gave up

On Mon, 7 Jul 2025, 3:34 pm service@simsonn.com,

I really need this config but there isn't a single config on your webpage
for my shifter

On Mon, 7 Jul 2025, 3:33 pm service@simsonn.com,
Not even Simsonn manager is picking up my shifter

 On Sun, 6 Jul 2025, 6:25 pm gavin rhodes, <grhodes939@gmail.com> wrote: 
 
 
 Hi buddy I have a huge problem well I call it huge u may call it a rookie mistake I have my pedals working and mate what a big step up for me only issue is I mistakenly also wrote the pedals config to my shifter didn't realise till it was too late it's the 7+r cylindrical shifter I can't get it back to default it doesn't work in games any more ? 
  
 On Sun, 6 Jul 2025, 4:22 pm gavin rhodes, <grhodes939@gmail.com> wrote: 
 
 
 Hi I recently purchased a Simsonn shifter but after a few days I bought the pedals and I used freejoy software to calibrate the pedals but up on doing that I wiped out the firmware to my shifter is there any chance I could get you to send me the firmware to make it work again please if not I'll be getting trading standards involves as I've tried contacting the company lots  and not had a reply yet
你好，gavin rhodes，  请先完成移位器的安装，然后在您的电脑上安装Todesk工具。我今天可以为您提供远程协助。Todesk 无需注册——只需在启动程序后 提供ID和临时密码即可。
ID 号为 1271 和 1311 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单1271  
      主题:   
      描述:  Hi I recently purchased a Simsonn shifter but after a few days I bought the pedals and I used freejoy software to calibrate the pedals but up on doing that I wiped out the firmware to my shifter is there any chance I could get you to send me the firmware to make it work again please if not I'll be getting trading standards involves as I've tried contacting the company lots  and not had a reply yet

合并来自工单1311  
      主题:   
      描述:  Hi sorry my device I'm sending the email from isn't sending these  pics for some reason

I have downloaded to desk do I need to open it up

On Tue, 8 Jul 2025, 1:15 am service@simsonn.com,

I have just put this on my computer and upon logging in it told me to enter
a valid phone number and password well that's my fone number and I don't
have a password

How do I get a verification code I've entered my number now but it's
telling me it's invalid that is my my phone number
I'll just go buy a different shifter this is a joke

Hi gavin rhodes,  ​Todesk does not require registration. After launching the software, simply click the close button in the top right corner to enter the main interface. Please provide your ID and temporary password, and we can schedule a time for remote assistance.

why have  you not got a config we can download  todesk is deffo not working
on my computer i if i dont get the help required to sort this i will take
it further diabolical customer service from simsonn

On Thu, 10 Jul 2025, 12:04 pm service@simsonn.com,
Hi gavin rhodes, You can try using this configuration file to restore the settings.

ok so the issue is that it use to display its name as simsonn h pattern
shifter but its now being displayed as freejoy 1.7.0 because of this the
game no longer picks it uo ive tried everything im at aloss on this shifter
short of throwing it in the bin bud im done ive tried so much to reset the
shifter

On Thu, 31 Jul 2025, 6:39 am service@simsonn.com,

Hi gavin rhodes,     After following my steps, the display will return to normal. Additionally, after each startup, you need to click “Read config from device”, otherwise the default Freejoy configuration will overwrite the correct settings in the firmware.

ill keep you posted bud but ive tried this soooo many times its  angering
me cus nothing is happening when i read the config from device ive tried
reading the config from device ive tried saving that config nothing changes
ive tried everything in freejoy and nope it deffo does not wprk if i coukd
send you a video i would but dont know how to and the software to desk
would not work on my pc

On Thu, 31 Jul 2025, 6:49 am service@simsonn.com,

Hi，gavin rhodes，     Please install the Todesk software. No registration is required, and if it prompts you to register, simply close the window.  I can assist you remotely to resolve the issue right now. ​​ ​  https://dl.todesk.com/windows/ToDesk_Setup.exe

give me a few mins because im walking dogs at the moment so as soon as im
home i will email you and let you know when ive downloaded it

On Thu, 31 Jul 2025, 7:07 am service@simsonn.com,
is this the right to desk
done downloaded and installed
downloaded todesk and installed it

i have downloaded to desk now what because so far nothing is happening and
i havent had a reply

ill give it another twnty mins if i havent had a reply within those mins
then ill just remove the software as i have stuff to do today and there is
no way am i leaving my computer unattended with this software on it so
please you said you were going to help the least you could do is reply to
let me know

minds made up im reportin u simple as that you said you were gonna help so
far im left with a fucked shifter and pc thanls bud
done reported trading standards police look

your getting a bill in the post simple as i have all your info and company
info
Hi gavin rhodes,  Please provide the ID and temporary password from Todesk; otherwise, I won’t be able to access your desktop remotely.
